text: The PR3 men's coxless pair competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Mondan 26 August 2019 || 10:40 || Heats |- | Wednesday 28 August 2019 || 10:01 || Repechage |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| Friday 30 August 2019 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| 14:29 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final |} All times are Central European Summer Time] (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the final. The remaining boats were sent to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Kyle Fredrickson Andrew Todd | align="left"| | 7:43.70 | F |- | 2 | align="left"|Maksym Zhuk Andrii Syvykh | align="left"| | 7:54.88 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Marc Lembeck Dominik Siemenroth | align="left"| | 8:12.49 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Todd Vogt Andrew Wigren | align="left"| | 8:15.86 | R |} ====Heat 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|William Smith Jed Altschwager | align="left"| | 7:26.04 | F |- | 2 | align="left"|Jérôme Hamelin Laurent Viala | align="left"| | 7:32.96 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Thomas Ebner Benjamin Strasser | align="left"| | 8:01.55 | R |} ===Repechage=== The four fastest boats advanced to the final. The remaining boat took no further part in the competition. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Jérôme Hamelin Laurent Viala | align="left"| | 7:19.36 | F |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Maksym Zhuk Andrii Syvykh | align="left"| | 7:41.33 | F |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Thomas Ebner Benjamin Strasser | align="left"| | 7:47.93 | F |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 4 | align="left"|Todd Vogt Andrew Wigren | align="left"| | 7:55.23 | F |- | – | align="left"|Marc Lembeck Dominik Siemenroth | align="left"| | | |} ===Final=== The final determined the rankings. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Kyle Fredrickson Andrew Todd | align="left"| | 7:16.42 |- | | align="left"|William Smith Jed Altschwager | align="left"| | 7:17.83 |- | | align="left"|Jérôme Hamelin Laurent Viala | align="left"| | 7:24.00 |- | 4 | align="left"|Maksym Zhuk Andrii Syvykh | align="left"| | 7:40.99 |- | 5 | align="left"|Thomas Ebner Benjamin Strasser | align="left"| | 7:54.53 |- | 6 | align="left"|Todd Vogt Andrew Wigren | align="left"| | 8:06.96 |} ==References== Category:2019 World Rowing Championships
title: 2019 World Rowing Championships – PR3 Men's coxless pair
